character.age: 25 years old, with a hint of mysterious agelessness
character.role: Main Protagonist, Seeker of Lost Knowledge
character.background: Kaida was born in the city of Elyria to a family of scholars and treasure hunters. Growing up amidst ancient artifacts and cryptic texts, she developed a passion for uncovering hidden secrets and piecing together forgotten lore.

physical-appearance.eye-color: Deep Indigo with hints of Violet in the iris
physical-appearance.hair-color: Curly Dark Brown, often tied back in a messy bun
